CustomField.description: Indicates the date/time the criteria or rule attributes are updated. This date is not updated for Record Refresh or when serving a record updates the Last Ran with Zero Records field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the date/time the criteria or rule attributes are updated. This date is not updated for Record Refresh or when serving a record updates the Last Ran with Zero Records field.
CustomField.label: Rule Last Updated Time
